description: Sum of digits of prime p is substring of p.
mathematica: fQ[n_] := Block[ {id = IntegerDigits@ n}, pid = Plus @@ id; MemberQ[ Partition[id, IntegerLength@ pid, 1], IntegerDigits@ pid]]; Select[ Prime@ Range@ 802, fQ] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 16 2011 *)Select[Prime[Range[1000]],SequenceCount[IntegerDigits[#], IntegerDigits[ Total[ IntegerDigits[ #]]]]> 0&] (* The program uses the SequenceCount function from Mathematica version 10 *)  (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Sep 30 2015 *)
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Nov 15 1999.
